extensionDescription.message: Clear your browser cache with a single click or via the F9 key.

notificationTitle.description: Title of the notification displayed after clearing cache.

notificationContent.message: The cache has been successfully cleared.
notificationContent.description: Informs the user that the cache has been cleared.

preferencesTitle.description: Title for the options displayed after clearing.

reloadOption.description: Option to reload the currently active tab.

currentTabOnlyOption.description: Option to clear data only for the current active tab.

notificationOption.description: Option to enable or disable notifications.

optionsTitle.description: Title for the types of data that can be cleared.

formOption.description: Option to clear saved form data.

workerOption.description: Option to clear service worker data.

preferencesSavedMessage.message: Your preferences have been saved successfully.
preferencesSavedMessage.description: Message displayed after the user saves their preferences.

contextMenuClearAndReload.description: Context menu item to clear cache and reload the current page.

timePeriodTitle.description: Title for the time period selection section.

timePeriodAll.description: Option to clear data from all time.

timePeriod15min.description: Option to clear data from last 15 minutes.

timePeriod1hour.description: Option to clear data from last hour.

timePeriod24hours.description: Option to clear data from last 24 hours.

timePeriod1week.description: Option to clear data from last week.

disabledTypesMessage.message: All data types have been disabled. Enable at least one data type in options.
disabledTypesMessage.description: Notification when all data types are disabled.

unsupportedUrlMessage.message: Cannot clear cache for this page type (about:, file://, etc). Try disabling 'Current tab only' option.
unsupportedUrlMessage.description: Notification when trying to clear cache for unsupported URL protocols.

currentTabLabel.description: Label shown in notifications when clearing data for current tab only.
